name: Offspring
description:
You play as a newborn fish creature competing to survive in a small tide pool populated with your cannibalistic siblings. Will you be the one who eats beats them all or be a stepping stone for someone else? 

IMPORTANT CONTROLS:

Games tend to be short, controlled exclusively with mouse.
Your character moves to your cursor when you click the left mouse button
Touch anyone smaller or of equal size to eat them.

Made for JamCraft 2018 in under 4 hours
